sub_title: Founder & Chief Visionary Officer at WorldHelp Initiative AG Pte.
summary: Mr. Daniel Joseph Co-Founder of WorldHelp Initiative AG Pte., specializes in Water Remediation & Purification; Agriculture; Renewable Energy Technology & Solutions; Integrated Smart City Developments; Project Technology Management and Infrastructure for AquaPlanet, African Financial Regulatory Authority (AFRA), African Central Bank (ACB), Innovative Health Labs, Oceti Sakowin Nations and Dene Athabaskan Tribes, and i3x Blockchain. Daniel primarily works in Africa, Asia, Pacific Rim and Middle East specifically dealing in (Africa) Republic of Congo, Ghana, Sierra Leone, Zimbabwe, and Democratic Republic of Congo;  (Asia) in Beijing, Tangshan, Shenzhen, Cambodia and Bali, Indonesia for polluted water of the surrounding areas;  (Pacific Rim) including specific Tribal expansions within Papua New Guinea, Vanuatu, Aboriginal Tribal Nations, and Maori Tribal Nations; and (Middle East) worked within Kuwait City, Bahrain, and Ajman with interactive technologies on site for immediate desalination, toxic cleanups, water purification, oil and natural gas water cleanup, and renewable energy solutions from waste water. He was assigned the official Continental Project Management Dir. of African Financial Regulatory Authority (AFRA), African Central Bank (ACB), and ASTAG Bank which represents all (55) countries in Africa as he sits as Board of Trustees of African Financial Regulatory Authority for infrastructure and development within Africa. He holds the dual positions as Ambassador of Foreign Affairs to the Oceti Sakowin Nations, hosting the official title as Diplomatic Ambassador to Lakota, Oglala, Sicangu, Hunkpapa, Nakota, Yankton Nations where he assists Oceti Sakowin Nations Tribal Exchange Sovereign Banking Division, and serves the Dene Athabaskan Tribes as Director of Global Operations.

treasury_media.title: GreenBank _ IMG_9118.jpeg
treasury_media.description: WorldHelp Initiative is the primary Global sponsor of GreenBank (Agriculture Bank).   Daniel Joseph is Chairman of the Board of Trustees and CEO of Global Operations Divisions for GreenBank (Globally).

profile_positions.description:
Mr. Daniel Joseph is the Co-Founder, and Chief Visionary Officer of WORLDHELP INITIATIVE AG headquartered in Singapore, focusing in water remediation; integrated GREEN friendly smart city developments; renewable energy solutions; holistic based agriculture export/import; and full scale sustainability technologies and project management with offices and project infrastructures in Africa, Asia, Pacific Rim, and Middle East.  WorldHelp Initiative is a for-profit organization which emphasizes both molecular and quantum level project technologies and developments for sustainability in 3rd World Countries. WorldHelp Initiative AG is the primary Global developer and sponsor of GreenBank (Agriculture Bank).

Daniel Joseph has stablished 70+ disruptive technologies in water, air, energy and holistic healthcare. Has an extensive background in printing internal paper for fixed income cash flow by full institutional grade fixed income portfolios, with a macro- focus on emerging capital markets, diversifying to micro- focus of internal Blockchain based social impact. Established Sovereign Export Zones in Africa for Blockchain driven Export / Import Zone under Sovereign and Tribal Law. Have licenses and global contracts from water remediation and energy sourcing and licenses for growth of agriculture.


Daniel Joseph also sits as FOUNDER and C.O.O. of ECOFARMS AG and Chairman of Board of Trustees of at the GreenBank (GreenBank.io) as well Chief Executive Officer of GlobalReset.io Campaign for Humanitarian and Sustainability Relief specifically in Blockchain. 

Daniel Joseph is specialized in Global Finance, Sales, Marketing, Blockchain Integration, Energy, Sustainability, Water Remediation, Social Impact, Nutraceuticals, Disruptive Technologies, Holistic Healthcare, Agriculture, Permaculture, Energy Harvesting, Quantum, Molecular, Nano Technologies and Energy Saving Solutions for Crypto Mining.

Contact:  worldhelp.io@protonmail.ch
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder & Chief Visionary Officer

profile_positions.description:
Daniel Joseph is the Chairman of the Board of Trustees and Chief Executive Officer of i3x of Hong Kong, with representation in Hong Kong, Singapore, Cambodia, Dubai and Emirates, i3x joined forces within the Blockchain community to introduce i3x, which is Indigenous, Innovation, and Infrastructure (i3x) internal-based Blockchain for project management and utilized for tracking/Exporting shipments for example in and between United Arab Emirates and Africa, including a DNA-based internal peer to peer and consumer to consumer Blockchain solutions for all involvement with Innovative Health Labs, GreenBank, HolisticX, AquaX, FrequencyX, InfuzeX, IntegrateX, and AFRAc, the official Continental coin for the African Financial Regulatory Authority. 

Blockchain i3x is the official internal exclusive Blockchain solution to WorldHelp Initiative and AquaPlanet for project tracking infrastructure in said emerging capital markets.
profile_positions.title: Senior Principal & Chairman of Board

profile_positions.description:
Mr.  Daniel Joseph holds the dual positions as Ambassador of Foreign Affairs to the Oceti Sakowin Nations, hosting the official title as Diplomatic Ambassador to Lakota, Oglala, Sicangu, Hunkpapa, Nakota, Yankton Nations.  Daniel also assists Oceti Sakowin Nations Tribal Exchange Sovereign Banking Division, where he is involved with structured fixed income for development and project wealth management accounts.  

Daniel Joseph lobbies for Oceti Sakowin Nations for the primary interest in Sovereign Banking from a Tribal banking capacity. 

Daniel Joseph also actively serves the Dene Athabaskan Tribes as Director of Global Operations where Daniel Joseph has served his fellow Tribal brothers and sisters assisting in infusing social, economic, and technological growth for global Tribal developments and infrastructures. Immediate goals include fixed income backed wealth management structuring and project management divisions for all Tribal Nations including project technology management and growth.
profile_positions.title: Ambassador for Foreign Affairs - Tribal Nations

profile_positions.description: Daniel Joseph is actively the Director of Project Operations for AquaPlanet.    Daniel Joseph has secured immediate project growth technology affiliates and strategic alignments in the arenas of remediation, desalination, waste management control, waste water to energy, and toxic waste recovery.   Daniel Joseph has a specific focus on Cholera outbreaks in said African, Asian and Middle Eastern Regions for AquaPlanet.  Aqua Planet is led by a group of global scientific molecular and quantum level entrepreneurs who are project management arms in the focusing on leading technology for the treatment of brackish waters with processes that use less energy than existing methods at a global capacity.  Daniel Joseph has worked under AquaPlanet as the Director of Project Operations in said emerging markets in Africa specifically in Republic of Congo, Ghana, Sierra Leone, Zimbabwe, and Democratic Republic of Congo.   In Asia, Daniel Joseph has assisted project growth for AquaPlanet in Beijing, Tangshan, Shenzhen, with a specific integrated smart city focus in Cambodia and Bali, Indonesia for polluted water of the surrounding areas.   As for the Tribal involvement, Daniel Joseph has introduced and proceeded in Tribal expansions in the Oceans and Rivers within Papua New Guinea, Vanuatu, Aboriginal Tribal Nations, and Maori Tribal Nations.   As a target and primary focus, Daniel Joseph has secured said Tribal relationships and necessary interactive technologies on site for immediate desalination, toxic cleanups, and water purification in said areas, and looks to launch full thread green vision for 2022 from a Global perspective,  within AquaPlanet.   As for Middle East, Daniel Joseph has worked with such entities within Kuwait City, Bahrain, and Ajman for purified water, oil and natural gas water cleanup, and renewable energy solutions from the waste water perspectives in Middle East.
profile_positions.title: Director of Project Operations

profile_positions.description: Mr. Daniel Joseph as assigned the official Continental Project Management & Development Team, approved by African Financial Regulatory Authority (AFRA), African Central Bank (ACB), and ASTAG Bank which represents all (55) countries in Africa. Daniel Joseph sits on the Board of Trustees of African Financial Regulatory Authority as Transactional Project Manager for infrastructure and development within Africa.
profile_positions.title: Director Of Project Development

profile_positions.description: Mr. Daniel Joseph,  acts as Chief Operational Officer of Innovative Health Labs operating out of both Canada and Italy Global Offices.  For IHL, Daniel Joseph focuses on the Emerging Markets sectors of Innovative Health Labs in said locations such as The Caribbean, Latin America, South America, and Africa.  To date, Daniel Joseph has secured and operated 40,000 hectares in five countries, providing a multitude of 3rd party growth and genetic DNA seed technologies for organic and holistic growths of said medicinal products, has maintained nano-technologies for said research and development for internal uses of Innovative Health Labs,  has established Export/Import Zones within the logistics of set arenas, and provided formalized research and development in the arenas of oxygenated water-based technologies. As Chief Operations Officer for IHL export/import distribution in Emerging Capital Markets, Daniel maintains constant growth in Agriculture including holistic based roots, trees, plants, and fruits for natural healing. Daniel's most recent focus with IHL based projects include Agricultural maintenance within the Middle East, Emirates, and Kuwait for export/import of GREEN based vegetables and produce, as well as large scale agricultural plot growth within Africa.
profile_positions.title: Chief Operating Officer COO
